title: Amorim confident in Man Utd making strong finish to season
description: Ruben Amorim says Manchester United are “looking up” as they aim to make a strong finish to the season, starting against Nottingham Forest on Tuesday. United sit 13th in the table on 37 points and could move up with a win, as Crystal Palace are not playing until Wednesday. title: The Numbers Game: Derby fever hits Merseyside as Liverpool host Everton
description: James Tarkowski’s last-gasp volley left Liverpool reeling in a dramatic conclusion to the final Merseyside derby at Goodison Park back in February.
